meanings.definition: Attractive or charming in a pretty or endearing way.
meanings.sent1: The puppy had a cutesie bow on its collar.
meanings.sent2: She wore a cutesie dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cutesie kitten played with a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: Her cutesie smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The cutesie flowers bloomed in the garden.

meanings.definition: Affecting or intended to appeal to the emotions in a sweet or adorable manner.
meanings.sent1: The cutesie movie made everyone feel happy.
meanings.sent2: The children's book had cutesie illustrations.
meanings.sent3: The cutesie song brought a tear to her eye.
meanings.sent4: His cutesie gesture melted her heart.
meanings.sent5: The cutesie teddy bear was her favorite toy.
